it was an OP epic campaign- the idea was to try and give them options to do anything and take advantage of it- let them use their imaginations a bit more and feel less restricted
some of them somehow turned that into a whole new way to not do anything though- truly they are amazing at not being creative sometimes
Funny how few to no restrictions can do that.
the most infuriating thing as a DM to hear is "I dont know what I can do" because often the answer is literally anything...
you can even choose to do nothing
*Fluffs character watches as a child dies in front of him- his beak curls in an impossible smile"

he had like 4 healing potions on him

But anywho- choice paralysis in D&D confuses the heck outa me
It doesn't confuse me just because it happens to me IRL so often, lmao
yeah but generally the consequences of messing up - make for a fun time - or a challenging time in D&D
not doing anything leads to a boring time
id rather someone make a bad choice in a D&D game than no choice at all
Yeah, but if it's someone who overthinks things, trying to puzzle out the potential of any action is what causes that paralysis.
I am guilty of being boring in dnd all too often
I think if my groups played more it would help
thats not the issue with us - XD we have been weekly very consistently for over 6 years
A lot of people don't like to get their character killed, so there's a lot of "Must prioritize survival" lol
dying is way more likely to happen if you do nothing
the most fun I've had with a character was for a one-off
he was also my most recent. maybe I'm just getting better at it

the real monsters are the ones that didnt eat it- truly insulting the life it gave up for us to continue living

Ngl, that was a huge portion of why I really didn't like Your Name.
Lien doesnt really respond adversely to most things unless they are a threat
I see Lien as more of a "Excuse me wtf r u doing?" response, lol
I get it, the first time the guy wakes up in a lady's body, going and fondling himself is funny. But after that? When she has made it expressly clear that she doesn't want that? Super fucked tbh.
i will defend Your Name in that they didnt have a choice- nor did he remember doing it- their memories faded
it was also a freak situation where like - its possible they might swap and be that way forever-
Nah, he even had a moment where he considered honoring her wishes and not doing it, then he does it anyways and is caught by the little sister.
though i do think they probably should have had her admit to kinda doing the same thing with him to make it more fair

they were both seriously messing with each others lives though- what he did- while not socially acceptable - didnt actually hurt anyone or their situation- while she spent a ton of his money and possibly did the same thing - just wasnt shown because in
japan - its very female centered on stuff like that
The whole movie was fucked sideways.
I think it's legitimately at the bottom of my list off all the anime movies I've watched.
even if it wasn’t as impactful it doesn’t mean such actions are dismissible
and its close to the top of mine XD
Ok lets say you swapped bodies with someone- but it wasnt temporary- you could never go back- are you saying its immoral to do anything with that body now?
I mean, if you can't swap back...that's YOUR body now.
in a way yes by the fact it’s still not technically yours
they had no idea what was going on
if it hits you you’re in someone else’s body it doesn’t mean you go ham with it
On the first few times they didn't, sure, but it happened over and over again to the point that they had a semi-functional speaking relationship with texting each other.
again- they lost memories about it all every time- im not even sure if that line was correct in the original translation
if it happens & you can’t swap back, you need to look into therapy so you can work out how this will effect you as individuals and together, granted the two ever meet

not sure how thats a therapy- if i swapped bodies with someone and they said i had to do whatever they said from now on- i'd tell em to screw off- thats my body now- i didnt have a choice- and im not going to force someone to do what i want with a body
suddenly becoming male would throw me into all sorts of crisis, let alone finding out some guy has my body
i have no control over anymore
The memories didn't completely fade until after the disaster. Like I mentioned before, the guy was 100% conscious that she didn't want him fondling her and he still went through with it.
the memories faded every time they left the bodies
that was explicit in the story
You and I are watching two different movies then.
and again- that line i dont know if it was translated correctly

it probably was- but thats anime
the whole point of the notebooks and phone messages was to keep track of it
because they would forget it like a dream
